simplified: 千里搭长棚，没有不散的宴席

pronunciation.pinyin: qiān lǐ dā cháng péng , méi yǒu bù sàn de yàn xí
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: qian1 li3 da1 chang2 peng2 , mei2 you3 bu4 san4 de5 yan4 xi2

details.simplified: 千里搭长棚，没有不散的宴席
details.traditional: 千里搭長棚，沒有不散的宴席

meanings.value: even if you build a thousand-league awning for it, every banquet must come to an end
